original_title: System of a Down: Live at MTV 2 Dollar Bill
overview: System of a Down concert performed during the MTV 2 Dollar Bill show, featuring: 1. Revenga 2. Hypnotize 3. Kill Rock 'N Roll 4. Lonely Day 5. This Cocaine (thanks MaxxPower) Makes Me Fell Like I'm on This Song 6. Toxicity 7. Sugar
title: System of a Down: Live at MTV 2 Dollar Bill
